content: Can you solve this language puzzle? Rearrange the letters in "artificial intelligence" to form two words, each describing the concept of AI in simple terms. Hint: The first word refers to the creation of machines that can perform tasks that usually require human intelligence, while the second word describes the ability of these machines to learn and improve their performance over time. What are the two words?

Certainly! The two words you're looking for are "facile" and "learning." Rearranging the letters in "artificial intelligence" gives you "facile" (which means easy or effortless, hinting at the creation of machines to perform tasks) and "learning" (which describes the ability of these machines to improve over time).
